com.cs361d.flashpoint.manager

Class BoardManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cs361d.flashpoint.manager.BoardManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Tile>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoardManagerAdvanced

    public class BoardManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Tile>
    Created By Elvric Trombert Class used to manage boardStates

      void endGameMessage(java.lang.String msg)
      Set the gameHasEnded boolean to true of the server so after refreshing the game and only after that it sends the end game command to all clients for the proper display of the end game message.
      void endTurnFireSpread()
      Spreads the fire at the end of a turn
      protected void explosion(int i, int j)
      Called when a fire spawns on top of a fire we resolve an explosion at the location passed Explosing spreads fire in all adjacent tiles if there is an obstacle in that direction the obstacle gets 1 damage else the fire spread to the adgecent tile if that tile already had fire then we carry on the spread of the fire in the same direction.
      protected void explosionFireSpread(int i, int j, Direction d)
      Called when there is no obstacle between the explostion location and the adjecent tile in the direction d responsible for spreading the fire in one direction.
      Tile getAdjacentTile(Tile t, Direction d)
      Get the tile adjacent to t in direction d if there is not tile at that location it returns null.
      java.util.List<Tile> getAllAdjacentTile(Tile t)
      Used to retrieve all adgecent tiles that it adjacent tile that are not null and can be accessed with no obstacle blocking the way
      java.util.ArrayList<Tile> getClosestAmbulanceTile(int i, int j)
      Used basic distance algorithm to retrieve the tiles that canContanAmbulance that are closest to fireFighters located at the i and j param.

      Used to retrived the tile that have fire on them as we clear the edges of fire before looking at possible knocked down fireFighters or dead victim to avoid infinit knock downs if the ambulance tile is on fire (Elvric: I made a modification to the method look at tiles that makes that code not that useful but I kept the current logic just in case feel free to change that)

      • replenishPOI

        protected void replenishPOI()
        Iterate through the board tile counting the number of point of interests left in the game if less than 3 then it spawns new POI if there are some left

      • explosionFireSpread

        protected void explosionFireSpread(int i,
                                   int j,
                                   Direction d)
        Called when there is no obstacle between the explostion location and the adjecent tile in the direction d responsible for spreading the fire in one direction.
        Parameters:
        i - adjacent tile i location
        j - adjacent tile j location
        d - direction of the spread

      • explosion

        protected void explosion(int i,
                         int j)
        Called when a fire spawns on top of a fire we resolve an explosion at the location passed Explosing spreads fire in all adjacent tiles if there is an obstacle in that direction the obstacle gets 1 damage else the fire spread to the adgecent tile if that tile already had fire then we carry on the spread of the fire in the same direction.
        Parameters:
        i -
        j -

      • updateSmoke

        protected void updateSmoke()
        Ensure that all the tiles with smoke catch fire at the end of turn

                                    int j)

      • updateVictimAndFireFighter

        protected void updateVictimAndFireFighter(java.util.List<Tile> tiles)
        This method is responsible for knocking down players in fire and removing victims standing on a space with fire
        Parameters:
        tiles - these are the tile that had fire at the end of the firespread before clearing the map edge

      • addNewPointInterest

        protected void addNewPointInterest()
        Responsible for adding new POI onto the board, it generates a random numbe for the i and j location until it finds a location with no POI. Then it gets the next victim from the victim array stored by BoardManager. If there is a fireFighter at that location then it reveals the victim if it is a false alarm it then calls the method again else it reveals it. and add that POI at the location wanted.

      • addNewPointInterest

        protected void addNewPointInterest(int i,
                                   int j)
        Adds a point of interest at the desired location
        Parameters:
        i -
        j -

      • removeEdgeFire

        removes the fire outside the building

      • getAdjacentTile

        public Tile getAdjacentTile(Tile t,
                            Direction d)
        Get the tile adjacent to t in direction d if there is not tile at that location it returns null.
        Parameters:
        t - the tile where we will get the adjacent tile from
        d - the direction we want to get the adjacent tile at
        Returns:

      • getClosestAmbulanceTile

        public java.util.ArrayList<Tile> getClosestAmbulanceTile(int i,
                                                         int j)
        Used basic distance algorithm to retrieve the tiles that canContanAmbulance that are closest to fireFighters located at the i and j param.
        Parameters:
        i - the i location of the fireFighter
        j - the j location of the fireFighter
        Returns:
        List of tile that are closest to the fireFighter and canContainAnAmbulance
        See Also:
        Tile.canContainAmbulance()

      • knockedDown

        protected void knockedDown(int i,
                           int j)
        If the tile has no fire or has no fireFighters there is no knock down so it returns else it retrieves the closest ambulance tile and while the tile still contains fireFighters it sets them to the new safe ambulance tile
        Parameters:
        i - i location of the tile we want to verify if there is a knockdown
        j - j location of the tile we want to verify if there is a knockdown

      • chooseForKnockedDown

        public void chooseForKnockedDown(Tile t,
                                 FireFighter f)
        Method not used was created for family game where fireFighter is at equidistance of two tiles that CAN_CONTAIN_AMBULANCE but was not finished
        Parameters:
        t -
        f -

      • getTilesWithFire

        public java.util.List<Tile> getTilesWithFire()
        Used to retrived the tile that have fire on them as we clear the edges of fire before looking at possible knocked down fireFighters or dead victim to avoid infinit knock downs if the ambulance tile is on fire (Elvric: I made a modification to the method look at tiles that makes that code not that useful but I kept the current logic just in case feel free to change that)
        Returns:
        the list of tile that have fire on them
        See Also:
        Tile

      • verifyVictimRescueStatus

        public boolean verifyVictimRescueStatus(Tile t)
        If the tile is an edge tile we verify if the tile contains a real victim if it does we set the tile to have no victim and increment the victim save count by 1
        Parameters:
        t - the tile where the victim is on
        Returns:
        true if the game has ended because enough victim have been rescued false otherwise

      • useDamageMarker

        public boolean useDamageMarker()
        Responsible to decrement the damage markers of the game.
        Returns:
        true if there still exits some damage marker false otherwise as the building collapses if no more damage markers are left

      • endGameMessage

        public void endGameMessage(java.lang.String msg)
        Set the gameHasEnded boolean to true of the server so after refreshing the game and only after that it sends the end game command to all clients for the proper display of the end game message.
        Parameters:
        msg - message to be displayed to clients when the game ends
        See Also:
        Server.serverExecuteGameCommand(String, String, String)

        Parameters:
        t - the tile we want to get all adjacent tiles of
        Returns:
        Tile list of all the adjacent tiles.
